name: OceanWNN
full_name: Wavelet Neural Network for Ocean fixed-point observing time series
paper: Study on Wavelet Neural Network Based Anomaly Detection in Ocean Observing Data Series.
description: OceanWNN combines wavelet neural network (WNN), classifying threshold and two detecting strategies. The WNN is trained without any labeled data to simulate the non-anomalous behaviors for next-step prediction. The classifying threshold was constructed according to the estimated distribution of long-term historical residual errors.
bibtex: @article{WANG2019106129,title = {Study on wavelet neural network based anomaly detection in ocean observing data series},journal = {Ocean Engineering},volume = {186},pages = {106129},year = {2019},issn = {0029-8018},doi = {https://doi.org/10.1016/j.oceaneng.2019.106129},author = {Yi Wang and Linsheng Han and Wei Liu and Shujia Yang and Yanbo Gao}}
